summary: A scientist tries to save his son from cancer but his experiments turn him into a shark-man instead. A group of people from a pharmaceutical corporation are sent to the mad doctor's island to investigate his activities.
cast: William Forsythe|Hunter Tylo|Jeffrey Combs|Elise Muller|Arthur Roberts|Lydie Denier|G.R. Johnson|Antony Argirov|Mariya Ignatova|Velizar Binev|Atanas Srebrev|Pavel Doychev|Atanas Mihailov|Emil Markov|Antonia Arra|Yoanna Boukovska|Asia Hristova|Nikolai Iliev|Violeta Sechkova|Nikolai Sotirov|Raicho Vasilev|Alexander Stanoev|Ivo Kehayov|Dimiter Doichinov|Stanimir Stamatov|Velizar Peev|Stilyan Mavrov|Radoslav Parvanov|George Karlukovski|Krasimir Simeonov
keywords: swimming in the ocean|eaten by a shark|waterfall|adrenal gland|psychotronic film
title: Sharkman
